mysql.title: MySQL
mysql.description: Maintaining 2 system architectures: source-replica replication and MySQL InnoDB Cluster. Provide guidance and suggestions to project teams accordingly.

delphix.title: Delphix
delphix.description: A test run of the data virtualization platform. Analyze, install and maintain the system and incorporate it into existing systems based on the requirements and limitations.

tsis.title: TSIS
tsis.description: A complete overhaul of a decade-old web application using React, Express and MySQL. This web portal displays info of databases instances managed by our team.

timeOffApplication.title: Time Off Application System
timeOffApplication.description: A QoL web application developed using React, Express and MySQL to minimize the manual procedures while team mates apply for time-offs.
